review: I am extremely impressed with this.  It compliments and extends the abilities of my Kindle Fire beautifully.  The screen sharing was perfect and could only be improved by having a quick toggle on the home screen which I still may figure out with more experimentation.Setup was simple and quick.  The one missing necessary channel is HBO Go and they say it's coming soon.I recommend this for everyone but especially for those technophobe relatives who have trouble with new things.  It's really simple.  The Netflix app is the best layout design out of any I've used so far too.  I've got a Roku, Logitech Revue and  a Chromecast and the Amazon Firestick has been the best yet!Another fantastic job from the Amazon Team!  Great job guys!

review: the fire stick is an easy way to connect to many streaming products now available by the Internet. There still are many apps missing. For example I am a member of acorn TV and really wish the app was available. I have read that it is coming but it would be appreciated if someone could tell me when. Also the screen mirroring function works great. I've tested it on my fire HDX and on my galaxy note 2 and it works well on both. The setup is easy and in about 15 minutes you're connected to the many products available on the fire stick . Netflix, Pandora , and many of the new streaming news services such as CBS and Huffington Post are also available . There also many other niche sites that are available and most of them are free . Enjoy the product and let me know if you hear about acorn TV . All in all it's a great start the key to long-term success is the number of apps available.
